lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/language/ !! Basic Usage # Provide a <> layout, use `ctrl+shift+L` to switch to this view ## or open it using a layout launcher like <> on the sidebar # When the layout opens, there are a few buttons at the top ## On the left is a series of add buttons that, when clicked, jump back to the default layout and add new tiddlers ## On the right are buttons that jump directly back to the default layout # Once you've added a few tiddlers, a table of data is displayed at the bottom of the layout, listing the tiddlers you've added. ## Clicking on the title of a tiddler in the table will jump back to the default layout and open that entry !! Tags The following tags are used in this entry to indicate that the entry records a symptom or health condition, the add button actually creates the entry with these tags: <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/debuff]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/buff]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/medicine]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/condition]]"> <$macrocall $name="tag" tag={{!!text}} /> {{!!caption}} - {{!!description}} You can make your own [ext[SuperTag|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/super-tag/]] by adding [[$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status]] tags to any tiddler. "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/language/zh-Hans/Readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/language/zh-Hans/Readme","text":"\procedure （备份：https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/） !! 注意事项 依赖插件有很多，如果没有使用 CPL 实现自动安装，请手动安装。 下面介绍几个最核心的依赖： !!! 超级标签 用于在任务条目下显示快速编辑字段的表单。 [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag]] !!! 任务建模本体 用于告诉超级标签插件，有哪些字段可以显示。 [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/tmo/readme]] !!! 动态表格 高性能的可排序表格，用于展示超级标签编辑过的任务相关字段。 [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/hyper-table]] type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/language/ !!基本用法 # 提供<>布局，使用 `ctrl+shift+L` 切换到该视图 ## 或使用侧边栏上的<>等布局启动器打开它 # 打开布局后，顶部有一些按钮 ## 左边是一系列添加按钮，点击后会跳转回默认布局，并添加新的条目 ## 右边是直接跳转回默认布局的按钮 # 等你添加了一些条目后，布局底部会显示一个数据表格，列出你添加的条目 ## 点击表格里的条目标题，会跳转回默认布局，并打开该条目 !! 标签 以下是本条目里用到的，用于表明条目记录了症状或健康情况的标签，添加按钮其实就是创建了带有这些标签的条目： <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/debuff]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/buff]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/medicine]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/condition]]"> <$macrocall $name="tag" tag={{!!text}} /> {{!!caption}} - {{!!description}} 你可以通过给任意条目添加 [[$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status]] 标签来制作你自己的[ext[超级标签|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/super-tag/]]。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/layout/IntentionTower":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/layout/IntentionTower","text":"\import \end <$scrollable fallthrough="none" class="itkg-IntentionTower-top-container tc-popup-keep tc-menubar-dropdown-sidebar">
